title: AWS SageMaker to Azure ML: MLOps, Automation, and Machine Learning Operations Excellence
description: Master machine learning operations by implementing comprehensive MLOps workflows with SageMaker Pipelines and migrating to Azure ML equivalents with CI/CD automation, infrastructure as code, model governance, and end-to-end ML lifecycle management.
learningObjectives: Implement comprehensive MLOps workflows with SageMaker Pipelines and Azure ML Pipelines
Build CI/CD automation for machine learning model development and deployment
Create infrastructure as code for ML platforms and reproducible environments
Design model governance and compliance frameworks for enterprise ML operations
Implement automated testing and validation workflows for ML systems
Build monitoring and observability for end-to-end ML operations
prerequisites: Completion of all previous MLA-C01 labs (Data Engineering, EDA, Model Development, Deployment)
Understanding of DevOps practices and CI/CD pipeline concepts
Experience with infrastructure as code, containerization, and cloud automation
Familiarity with model governance, compliance, and operational monitoring
businessScenario: MLOps Enterprise provides machine learning platform services for large organizations requiring comprehensive ML operations, governance, and automation. Their platform engineering team needs to implement enterprise-grade MLOps workflows including automated pipelines, model governance, compliance monitoring, and infrastructure management. They must master both AWS and Azure ML operations platforms to deliver reliable, scalable, and compliant ML services.

troubleshooting.issue: Complex ML pipeline failures and dependency management across multiple services
troubleshooting.solution: Implement comprehensive error handling, use circuit breakers, implement detailed logging, create dependency mapping, use pipeline visualization, and implement automated rollback

troubleshooting.issue: Infrastructure scaling issues and resource contention in multi-team environments
troubleshooting.solution: Implement resource quotas, use intelligent scheduling, implement auto-scaling policies, create resource monitoring, implement priority queues, and use cost optimization

troubleshooting.issue: Model governance policy conflicts and approval workflow bottlenecks
troubleshooting.solution: Implement flexible policy frameworks, use automated policy validation, create escalation procedures, implement approval automation, use risk-based governance, and create clear policies
